title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button and the label no longer stay on the same line. Instead, the close button moves down to another line below the label.
EB: The close button and the label should always stay on the same line regardless of the size of the view. The close button should remain located to the far-right corner.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe the position of the close button in relation to the label.
4. Repeat steps 2-3 with different view sizes to confirm the behavior.
